meanings.definition: In an animated manner; with liveliness and energy.
meanings.sent1: She spoke animatedly about her favorite book, her eyes shining with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The children played animatedly in the park, laughing and running around.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail animatedly as it chased its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset danced animatedly across the sky, painting it in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The magician waved his wand animatedly, making objects disappear and reappear in a flash.

meanings.sent1: The animatedly painted mural on the wall brought life to the dull alley.
meanings.sent2: Her animatedly facial expressions made it clear how she felt about the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The animatedly cartoon characters on the screen made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The animatedly gestures of the conductor guided the orchestra through a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The animatedly debate between the two politicians kept the audience engaged and entertained.
